title: Minimum One Bit Operations to Make Integers Zero
content:
Given an integer , you must transform it into 0 using the following operations any number of times:

Change the rightmost () bit in the binary representation of .
Change the  bit in the binary representation of  if the  bit is set to 1 and the  through  bits are set to 0.

Return the minimum number of operations to transform  into 0.
